scavengerHunts.title: The name of the hunt
scavengerHunts.task: The short description of what the user needs to take a photo of to pass this hunt
scavengerHunts.radius: The radius (in feet) of location in which user should be in in order to pass this hunt
scavengerHunts.category: What this hunt relates to. Either one of the following categories: [food, desert, coffee, outdoor, landmark]
